name: Temperature Trials
description:
NOW YOU'VE REALLY DONE IT!

You picked up the mysterious sword from the temple and found yourself stuck between two extreme dimensions! Fight monsters in the two realms and make sure you don't freeze  or overheat to death. 

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Interact - Left Mouse Button

Pause - Escape

CREDITS:

Belle - Art, Programming

Justin - Level Design, UI Design, Sound Design

Gramsinator - Concept/Level Design, Sound Design

Ashley Poprik - Narrative Direction

Arthur - Art, Programming
